ai:cl.c: Provides support for the filling and stroking of vectors with patterns.

ai:f.c: Inherit attributes from a VectorPattern referenced here.
A linked list of transform matrices that have been applied to the pattern.
Refers to the internal VectorScene that will contain the rendered pattern.
The behaviour to use when the pattern bounds do not match the vector path.
Applies a transform to the pattern during the render process.
Defines the coordinate system for fields X, Y, Width and Height.
Refers to the viewport that contains the pattern.
